content:
path /v3/tron/broadcast
operationId TronBroadcast
summary Broadcast a TRON transaction
description 5 credits per API call
Broadcast Tron transaction This method is used internally from Tatum client libraries
It is possible to create custom signing mechanism and use this method only for broadcasting data to the blockchain
requestBody
TronBroadcast
type object
required
txData
txData
type string
description Raw signed transaction to be published to network
minLength 1
maxLength 50000
required True
responses
200
TransactionHash
type object
txId
description The hash ID of the transaction
type string
required
txId
description OK
